# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.DE property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

Debugging Extensions. A value of true indicates Support for I/O breakpoints.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: DE
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean
